tool.name: Downsample SAM/BAM
tool.description: Downsample a file to retain a subset of the reads

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Select SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM or BAM dataset

param.name: probability
param.label: Probability (between 0 and 1) that any given read will be kept
param.help: PROBABILITY; specify 1 to keep all reads, 0.1 to keep 10% of the reads
